concept.title: PGI 233.170 Briefing requirement for protested acquisitions valued at $1 billion or more.

conbody.p: In the event of a protest of a competitively awarded Major Defense Acquisition Program or of an acquisition of services valued at $1 billion or more, the agency concerned shall provide a briefing to the Principal Director, Defense Pricing and Contracting, within 10 days of the filing of the protest. The briefing must outline—
(c) Any other information the agency deems relevant to the protest.
